alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Cleveland; Desha; Drew; Jefferson; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 10:47PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Cleveland, northwestern Desha, north central Drew, southeastern Jefferson, Lincoln and central Arkansas Counties through 1115 PM CST... At 1047 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Richardson to near Cane Creek State Park to near Herbine. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dumas... Star City... Gould... Gillett... Grady... Mitchellville... St. Charles... Whitefield... Little Bayou Meto Park... Woodville... Douglas... Herbine... Nebo... Feenyville... Cottondale... Omega... Linwood... Cane Creek State Park... Madding... Mills... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for southeastern Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Arkansas; Cleveland; Desha; Drew; Jefferson; Lincoln
